page.description: The steps involved in defining a picture dialog box.

step.description: Optionally, check Button displays a different picture when button is pressed.
Select the source of the image. The options are:

case.title: Embedded
case.description: Loads and embeds the selected image into the layout. When you embed an image, the original Windows Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG (.JPG) file is no longer needed; the embedded copy is stored in the database's data dictionary. If you plan to distribute a database, you can embed so that you do not have to supply separate image files.

case.title: File
case.description: Displays the Windows Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG (.JPG) file you select.

case.title: Library
case.description: Displays an image of type .BML from the Alpha Five Bitmap Library (if installed).
2. Navigate to and select the Windows Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG (.JPG) image file.
2. Navigate to and select the Windows Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG (.JPG) image file.
1. Click the 'up' button to display the Insert Image dialog box.
2. Select the image and click Insert.
3. If you checked Button displays a different picture when button is pressed, display the Pressed tab and repeat steps 5b through 5d for the second image.

step.description: Click OK to save your inputs.
